explanation: [0-0] A man wearing glasses and an orange jacket stands in a brightly colored room, facing the camera.
[0-4] The man in the orange jacket laughs heartily and steps back, revealing toy guns hanging on him and in his hands. He then raises a toy gun and shoots towards the camera.
